articles.title: NASA Artemis 2 Test Tarihi Öne Çekildi
articles.title_tr: NASA Artemis 2 Test Tarihi Öne Çekildi
articles.summary: NASA, insanlığı tekrar derin uzaya götürecek olan Artemis 2 görevi için hazırlıklarını hızlandırıyor. Ajans, fırlatma öncesindeki en kritik engellerden biri olan yakıt dolum testini bu hafta sonu gerçekleştirmeyi hedefliyor. Normalde 2 Şubat’ta yapılması planlanan bu kritik test, 31 Ocak Cumartesi gününe çekildi. Eğer her şey yolunda giderse, Artemis 2 görevinin 6 Şubat kadar erken bir […]

articles.title: Battlefield 6 And Redsec Update Addresses Movement, Audio Issues, And More
articles.title_tr: Battlefield 6 And Redsec Update Addresses Movement, Audio Issues, And More
articles.summary: A new Battlefield 6 update is planned for February 3, and the patch notes detail changes focused on quality-of-life improvements across Battlefield 6 and Redsec battle royale. This includes map adjustments, audio improvements, and small movement fixes.Battlefield Studios continues to make improvements following the delay of Season 2, and the developer says this update has a "particular focus on smoothing out edge cases reported by players."One of the major changes detailed in the patch notes is a fix for inconsistent player movement issues, including cases of excessive sprint-jump momentum and unintended behavior. The developer says the adjustment won't impact player movement on a large scale and is instead meant to target those specific extreme cases.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Hazine üç ayda 1 trilyon 280 milyar TL borçlanma planlıyor
articles.title_tr: Hazine üç ayda 1 trilyon 280 milyar TL borçlanma planlıyor
articles.summary: Hazine ve Maliye Bakanlığı, Şubat-Nisan döneminde 1 trilyon 539,3 milyar lira iç borç servisine karşı 1 trilyon 280,7 milyar liralık iç borçlanma yapacak. Bu dönemde 18 tahvil ve 2 hazine bonosu ihalesi düzenlenecek, 8 kira sertifikası doğrudan satışa sunulacak.

articles.title: Yatırım araçlarında haftalık sıçrama: Hangi fon ve varlıklar zirveye çıktı?
articles.title_tr: Yatırım araçlarında haftalık sıçrama: Hangi fon ve varlıklar zirveye çıktı?
articles.summary: Borsa İstanbul haftayı güçlü bir yükselişle tamamladı: BIST 100 yüzde 6,51 artarken, altının gram fiyatı ve çeyrek altın da değer kazandı. Dolar ve euroda yükseliş sürerken, yatırım ve emeklilik fonları yatırımcısına kazandırdı. Özellikle “Kıymetli Maden” fonları yüzde 15’in üzerinde getirisiyle dikkat çekti.

articles.title: Ünlülere uyuşturucu soruşturması: Mika Raun gözaltına alındı
articles.title_tr: Ünlülere uyuşturucu soruşturması: Mika Raun gözaltına alındı
articles.summary: Ünlülere yönelik yürütülen uyuşturucu soruşturması çerçevesinde sosyal medya ünlüsü Mika Can Raun gözaltına alındı. Tutuklu bulunan eski futbolcu Ümit Karan, etkin pişmanlık hükümleri çerçevesinde ifade vermek için savcılığa başvurdu. Firari şüpheli Merve Taşkın hakkında da yakalama kararı çıkarıldı.

articles.title: Late bedtimes are linked to higher heart disease risk
articles.title_tr: Late bedtimes are linked to higher heart disease risk
articles.summary: People who naturally stay up late may be putting their hearts under added strain as they age. A large study tracking more than 300,000 adults found that middle-aged and older night owls had poorer overall heart health and a higher risk of heart attack and stroke than those who were active earlier in the day, with the effect especially pronounced in women. Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.
articles.summary_tr: People who naturally stay up late may be putting their hearts under added strain as they age. A large study tracking more than 300,000 adults found that middle-aged and older night owls had poorer overall heart health and a higher risk of heart attack and stroke than those who were active earlier in the day, with the effect especially pronounced in women. Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.

Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.
articles.long_summary_tr: People who naturally stay up late may be putting their hearts under added strain as they age. A large study tracking more than 300,000 adults found that middle-aged and older night owls had poorer overall heart health and a higher risk of heart attack and stroke than those who were active earlier in the day, with the effect especially pronounced in women. Much of this elevated risk appeared to stem from lifestyle factors common among evening types, including smoking and inadequate sleep.

articles.title: Why An Elder Scrolls TV Show Would Struggle, According To Former Bethesda Dev
articles.title_tr: Why An Elder Scrolls TV Show Would Struggle, According To Former Bethesda Dev
articles.summary: The Fallout TV show based on Bethesda's game franchise is proving popular, prompting some to wonder if another one of the company's franchises, The Elder Scrolls, could get its own show. That remains to be seen, but now former Bethesda designer Bruce Nesmith has said an Elder Scrolls TV show probably would not work.He told Press Box PR (via Insider Gaming) that there is "something very special and different" about Fallout that makes it good fodder for a TV show. On the other hand, The Elder Scrolls is a "standard kind of fantasy" story, and those have been done again and again and again on TV, he said."That's not as interesting, not in this day and age where you already have The Lord Of The Rings movies. We've got Game Of Thrones. You'd have to try to find something to lean into that would be special about it," Nesmith explained.Continue Reading at GameSpot
